title: karuNai mUrtiyAna
sahitya:
karuNai mUrtiyAna kArtikEyanai nAm sharaNam aDaindu janma sAphalyam uralAm


anupallavi

  dharaNi tanilE perum pugazguDan tiruvEragam tanil tigazhum vaDivazhagan


caraNam    aDaikkalam enat-tannai aDaiyum anbarai kaDait-tETri viDuvadaik-kaDamai enakkoNDu
paDai vIDugaLAril kuDi koNDirukkum bhakta paripAlanAgum shakti vaDivElan
